sections.title: Introduction
sections.content:
Note: **This article or section does not follow the Laptop page guidelines.** This article or section does not follow the Laptop page guidelines.

This article or section does not follow the Laptop page guidelines.

Table content:
Hardware | PCI/USB ID | Working?
Touchpad | 04F3:3195 | Yes
TrackPoint | 06CB:CE67 | Yes
Touch screen |  | Yes
GPU (Intel) | 8086:7d45 | Yes
Webcam | 5986:1199 | Yes
Bluetooth | 8087:0033 | Yes
Audio | 8086:7e28 | Yes
Wireless | 8086:7e40 | Yes
NPU | 8086:7d1d | Yes

The Lenovo ThinkPad T14/T14s (Intel) Gen 5 was introduced in July 2024. It features a 14" screen, 1st generation Intel Core Ultra processors, and integrated Intel Arc graphics. Everything works out the box with kernel >=6.12.

To ensure you have this version, install the package dmidecode and run:

```
# dmidecode -s system-version
```

```
ThinkPad T14 Gen 5
```

For a general overview of laptop-related articles and recommendations, see Laptop.

sections.title: Intel Turbo Boost Max
sections.content:
Check that IntelÂ® Turbo Boost Max Technology 3.0 is enabled using

```
$ cat /sys/devices/system/cpu/intel_pstate/no_turbo
```

An output of 1 means it is not enabled, so you will have to reset your BIOS to defaults. After doing that, running the command again should print 0. You should be able to see your CPU boosting way higher.

sections.title: Sound
sections.content: This laptop requires Sound Open Firmware for the internal sound card to work.

sections.title: Firmware
sections.content: fwupd supports updating the UEFI BIOS, NVMe SSD, Embedded Controller, Intel Management Engine out of the box.

sections.title: Function keys
sections.content:
Table content:
Key | Visible?1 | Marked?2 | Effect
Fn+Esc | No | Yes | Enables Fn lock
Fn | Yes | Yes | XF86WakeUp
Fn+F1 | Yes | Yes | XF86AudioMute
Fn+F2 | Yes | Yes | XF86AudioLowerVolume
Fn+F3 | Yes | Yes | XF86AudioRaiseVolume
Fn+F4 | Yes | Yes | XF86AudioMicMute
Fn+F5 | Yes | Yes | XF86MonBrightnessDown
Fn+F6 | Yes | Yes | XF86MonBrightnessUp
Fn+F7 | Yes | Yes | XF86Display
Fn+F8 | Yes | Yes | XF86WLAN
Fn+F9 | Yes | Yes | XF86Messenger
Fn+F10 | Yes | Yes | XF86Go
Fn+F11 | Yes | Yes | Cancel
Fn+F12 | Yes | Yes | XF86Favorites
Fn+Space | No | Yes | Toggle keyboard backlight3

1. The key is visible to wev and similar tools.
1. The physical key has a symbol on it, which describes its function.
1. Works out of the box, but it can be controlled by software.
